text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a APND

name: ActRelationshipIsAppendage
title: ActRelationshipIsAppendage
description: An addendum (source) to an existing service object (target), containing supplemental information. The addendum is itself an original service object linked to the supplemented service object. The supplemented service object remains in place and its content and status are unaltered.
